content: रसवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Juicy, succulent. {@--2@} Tasteful, savoury, sapid, well-flavoured; यदेवोपनतं दुःखात्सुखं तद्रसवत्तरं <ls>V. 3. 21</ls>; संसारसुखवृक्षस्य द्वे एव रसवत्फले . काव्यामृतरसास्वादः संपर्कः सज्जनैः सह ... {@--3@} Moist, well-watered. {@--4@} Charming, graceful, elegant. {@--5@} Full of feeling or sentiment, impassioned. {@--6@} Full of affection, possessed of love. {@--7@} Spirited, witty. --ती A kitchen.
